item-prices.head-label: Price list for the new price
item-prices.pricelist-select-placeholder: Select a price list to add the new price to...

exporter.priceSubtitle: Export prices to a JSON or CSV file
exporter.pricelistSubtitle: Export your price list to a JSON or CSV file
exporter.priceAssignmentSubtitle: Export your price assignment to a JSON or CSV file

assignments-delete.title: Confirm Delete
assignments-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected price list assignment(s)?

assignments-delete-all.title: Confirm Delete
assignments-delete-all.warning: WARNING: This change is final and cannot be undone. Applying this change may result in a data loss.
assignments-delete-all.message: All filtered items will be deleted

pricelists-delete.title: Confirm Delete
pricelists-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected price list(s)?

pricelist-item-list-delete.title: Confirm Delete
pricelist-item-list-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete all prices for the selected product(s) in this price list?

item-prices-delete-confirmation.title: Confirm Delete
item-prices-delete-confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected price(s)?

item-prices-delete-error.title: Error
item-prices-delete-error.message: You must have at least one price per single unit (with minimum quantity at 1).

prices-save.title: Save changes
prices-save.message: The prices have been modified. Do you want to save changes?

pricelist-save.title: Save changes
pricelist-save.message: The price list has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

assignment-save.title: Save changes
assignment-save.message: The catalog assignment has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

assignment-save-validation.title: Save changes
assignment-save-validation.message: For a price list assignment, you must provide either a catalog or a store. You cannot leave both fields blank.

Calendar.title: Pricing indexing date and time
Calendar.description: Date and time the price indexing task will start at

PageSize.title: Page size being used for Export / Import
PageSize.description: Providing high values may lead to slow performance

LogPricingChanges.title: Log pricing changes
LogPricingChanges.description: Logs changes into the platform operation log. This might impact database size in case prices get changed often.

Enable.title: Enable product price indexing
Enable.description: Enable this option to include the product price into the product index. This will also cause product re-indexing once the price gets changed.

StorePricesInIndex.title: Store all product prices as an index object
StorePricesInIndex.description: Enable this option to store all product prices in the index within a nested field as <ProductName_price>

Enable.title: Enable event-based indexing for pricing entities
Enable.description: Any changes to a catalog entity will trigger a background task that will apply these changes to the search index.

VirtoCommerce.Pricing.description: Export or import price lists, assignments, and prices

VirtoCommerce.PricingModule.Data.ExportI.name: Full price list data
VirtoCommerce.PricingModule.Data.ExportI.description: Price list data with related objects. Supports JSON export provider only
